title.narrative: Supporting Disadvantaged Older People by Replicating Intergenerational Self-Help Club Model in Vietnam

description.narrative: Good replication of best practice (ISHC) at provincial level.
Have best practice for promoting DG's well-being.

This project aims to improve the wellbeing of disadvantaged people in Vietnam through work towards 5 key outcomes:Outcome 1: Have best practice for promoting DG's well-being through establishing ISHCs as a sustainable informal mechanism Outcome 2: To promote reasonable and reliable income for DGs Outcome 3: To improve the health and care status of DGs Outcome 4: To improve DGs access to right and entitlement Outcome 5: Good replication of best practice (ISHC) at provincial level
To improve DGs access to right and entitlement.
To improve the health and care status of DGs.
To promote reasonable and reliable income for DGs.
